name: Arcane Focus
rules: Arcane Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Ready one of your resources. Use only if you've played another Arcane or [Arcane] card this turn.

name: Armed to the Teeth
rules: Your hero deals melee damage to target ally equal to 3 plus the number of equipment you have.

name: Aura of Fanaticism
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing: Your hero has +1 ATK for each ally in your party.; Allies in your party have -1 health.
flavour: Know that your sacrifice will bring me great glory this day. - Crusader Goodchilde

name: Avenging Wrath
rules: Double your hero's ATK this turn.
flavour: Evil shows no mercy, nor is it shown any by the Light.

name: Banish to the Nether
rules: Remove target ability, ally, or equipment from game.; Ongoing: When Banish to the Nether leaves play, the owner of that removed card puts that card into play.
flavour: Those who enter the Nether rarely return.

name: Blade Twisting
rules: Combat Hero Required; Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage to an ally, destroy it, and it's controller discards a card.

name: Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target ally for each card in your hand.
flavour: You can crunch numbers and probabilities all you want; what it all boils down to is fire, baby - FIRE! - Blaize Brightspark

name: Blessed Life
rules: Holy Hero Required;Ongoing: If your hero would be dealt damage, you can put Blessed life into to your hand. If you do, prevent that damage.

name: Blessing of the Martyr
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK while attacking.; When attacked ally is destroyed, its owner puts it from his graveyard into hand.

name: Bloodbath
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing: 1, Destroy an ally in your party -> Put a +1 ATK counter on each of your weapons.
flavour: A blade that has tasted blood develops a thirst for it.

name: Castigate
rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally, or 6 if your hero has no damage.
flavour: Purity be necessary for joo to be at one's best, mon. The mojo got da flow clean. - Runetusk

name: Champion Stance
rules: Ongoing: If your hero would deal damage, it deals that much +1 instead.; If your hero would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it.
flavour: When on learns to stand, then others will surely fall. - Codex of Defense

name: Chew Toy
rules: If you control a Form, destroy target ally.
flavour: Ever notice how totems look like scratching posts? - Warden Stormclaw

name: Cloak of Shadows
rules: Destroy any number of target abilities attached to your hero. ; Your hero is Untargetable this turn.
flavour: Revel in the cool shelter of the shadows. - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 5

name: Crusade
rules: Retribution Hero Required; Ongoing: Your hero has +2 ATK when attacking.; When your hero deals combat damage to a Demon ally, destroy it.
flavour: The Light will unite the righteous to strike down the wicked. - Commander Goodchilde

name: Curse of Frenzy
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally must attack if able and can only attack allies if able.
flavour: I have seen that look once before - on an orc. - Marlowe Christophers

name: Cut to the Chase
rules: As an additional cost to play, remove up to five Combo cards in your graveyard from the game.; Your hero deals that much melee damage to each opposing ally.
flavour: I am an equal-opportunity pain provider. - Jonas White

name: Darkness
rules: Shadow Hero Required; Target player discards his hand.
flavour: Your mind has betrayed you. - Kintara Wintermoon.

name: Deafening Shout
rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -3 ATK / -3 health.
flavour: The strong lay down only their weapons. The weak lay down their lives.

name: Death Shock
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target ally for each damage on your hero.
flavour: Feel my pain. - Ixamos the Corrupted

name: Death Trap
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.); Destroy target attacking ally. If you do, your hero deals 1 nature damage to each hero and ally in that ally's party.
flavour: It's a trap!

name: Demonic Knowledge
rules: Demonology Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust], Destroy a Demon in your party -> Draw two cards.
flavour: Everything has a cost. Everything. - Plague Fleshbane

name: Diversion
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust], Exhaust an ally in your party -> Your hero has +2 ATK and Stealth this turn.
flavour: I don't care what you do. Jump up and down. Yell. Dance. Just get their attention. - Ressa Shadeshine

name: Divine Riposte
rules: Ongoing: When damage that would be dealt to a hero or ally in your party is prevented, your hero deals that much unpreventable holy damage to its source.
flavour: Turn back now. There is no passage for you here. - Nimaasus the Implacable

name: Earth Mother's Blessing
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally had +3 ATK / +3 health.; When attached ally is destroyed, draw a card.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: From nature comes everything. Those who appreciate that may partake of its bounty. - Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem

name: Eclipse
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing: When damage is healed from an opposing hero or ally, your hero deals double that much shadow damage to that character.
flavour: I will eclipse the Holy Light with the shadow of fear. - Remba, Abbess of Ash

name: Elemental Precision
rules: Elemental Hero Required;Ongoing: If a hero or ally in your party would deal nature [Nature] damage, it deals double that much instead.
flavour: Nature cannot be mastered. But with patience, it can be persuaded.

name: Enlightenment
rules: Discipline Hero Required; You pay 1 less to play Enlightenment for each ability card in your graveyard.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you win the game.

name: Evasion
rules: Ongoing: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to your hero.
flavour: Even if you see a rogue, there's no guarantee your strikes will, too.

name: Fade
rules: Play only if an ally is in your party.; Your hero is Elusive and Untargetable this turn.
flavour: This is not the priest you are looking for. - Kintara Wintermoon

name: Feeding Frenzy
rules: Traitor Hero Required; As an aditional cost to play, destroy any number of allies in your party.; Target Pet in your party has +2 ATK this turn for each ally destroyed this way.

name: Feign Death
rules: Play only if your hero is defending or the target of an opposing card or effect.; Interrupt all cards and effects, then end the turn.
flavour: Hunters blur the line between life and death.

name: Fel Fire
rules: Attack to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.; 3 -> Your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
flavour: No natural force can extinguish this fire.

name: Find Weakness
rules: Assassination Hero Required; Ongoing: When you remove one or more Combo cards from your graveyard to play a Finishing Move, your hero deals that much melee damage to target hero or ally.

name: Flash of Light
rules: Your hero heals all damage from target ally.; Draw a card.
flavour: The Light is quickest when the situation is most dire. - Commander Goodchilde

name: Form of the Serpent
rules: Traitor Hero Required;Ongoing: When your hero attacks, put a poison counter on Form of the Serpent. Your hero has +1 ATK this combat for each poison counter.; Remove all poison counters -> Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target ally for each counter removed this way.

name: Frost Armor
rules: Ongoing: 1, Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game -> Target ally can't attack this turn.
flavour: Anyone can hit a mage. Once. - Morganis Blackvein

name: Frostbite
rules: Frost Hero Required; Ongoing: 1, Discard a Frost or [Frost] card -> Opponents pay 2 more to play cards this turn.
flavour: This unnatural cold hounds us like a rabid animal! - Morn Walks-the-Path

name: Gift of Nature
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Ongoing: Allies in your party can't be destroyed by fatal damage.; At the end of each turn, destroy all allies in your party with fatal damage.

name: Gut Shot
rules: Traitor Hero Required; As an additional cost to play, remove up to five ally cards in your graveyard from the game.; Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to 2 plus the number of cards removed this way.

name: Invisibility
rules: Your hero is Elusive and Untargetable this turn.; Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies lose and can't have Elusive or Untargetable.
flavour: They'll never see it coming.

name: Invocation
rules: Ongoing: 2, Destory Invocation -> This turn, your resources have [Exhaust] -> Draw a card.
flavour: Allow me a moment to catch my breath - Obora the Wise

name: King of the Jungle
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has +1 ATK while attacking for each other ability you control.; Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Lacerate
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 melee damage to target opposing hero.; Your hero is in bear form. (Is a Protector. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Life Cycle
rules: Your hero heals 2 damage from each hero and ally in your party, then deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally for each damage healed this way.

name: Living Pyre
rules: Attach to target hero or ally. ; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character for each ability named Living Pyre attached to it.
flavour: Ember glows; fire grows; death sows.

name: Maelstrom Weapon
rules: Your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero or ally.; Attach to one of your Melee weapons.; Ongoing: When you strike with attached weapon, your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Melt Face
rules: Target player destroys an ally in his party.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Servants of the Betrayer (EA),Archive
flavour: Some priests heal; others enhance. I, however, melt faces! - Omedus the Punisher

name: Metalmorph
rules: Attach to target equipment. ; Ongoing: Attached equipment loses and can't have powers and can't be exhausted.
flavour: Well... you could give them to your mother.

name: Murderous Torment
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing: When an opponent draws a card, your hero deals 1 arcane damage to his hero.

name: Papa Hummel's Old-Fashioned Pet Biscuit
rules: Attach to target Pet ally in your party and put X growth counters on Papa Hummel's Old-Fashioned Pet Biscuit.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 ATK/+1 health for each growth counter.
flavour: The secret is in the oats.

name: Personal Weather Maker
rules: Ongoing: Play with the top card of your deck revealed.; Opponents can't target cards in play you control that share a type with the top card of your deck.
flavour: Today's forcast calls for…

name: Pilfer
rules: Target opponent discards his hand, then draws that many cards. Your hero deals 1 melee damage to that opponent's hero for each card discarded in this way.
flavour: It's not stealing, technically. It's unauthorized trading. - Jonas White

name: Prayer of Mending
rules: Attach to friendly ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 3 damage from attached ally. When attached ally is destroyed, put Prayer of Mending from its owner's graveyard into play attached to target friendly ally.

name: Rain of Arrows
rules: Your hero deals ranged damage to target hero or ally equal to 2 plus the number of other abilities you've played this turn.
flavour: The only thing that stopped the rain from falling was an empty quiver.

name: Ranged Weapon Specialization
rules: Marksmanship Hero Required; Ongoing: Your Ranged Weapons have +2 ATK and you pay 1 less to strike with them.
flavour: A true marksman is not the one who never misses; it's one who always kills. - The Greatest Race of Hunters

name: Ripped through the Portal
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Put an ally card that's removed from the game into play under your control.
flavour: I will rip apart reality itself to find what I seek! - Marlowe the Felsworn

name: Ritual of Souls
rules: Play only if two or more allies are in your party.; Ongoing: Ritual of Souls, enters play with four spirit counters.; [Exhaust], remove a spirit counter -> Your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally. If no counters remain, destroy Ritual of Souls.

name: Run to Ground
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, target an opposing hero or ally. Allies in your party have +3 ATK while attacking that character this turn.
flavour: Focus your fire on the greatest threat. Eliminate it. Repeat. - The Greatest Race of Hunters

name: Sacrificial Poison
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Attach to target hero that your hero dealt combat damage to this turn.; Ongoing: At the start of attached hero's controller's turn, he destroys an ally in his party.

name: Salvation
rules: Your hero heals 8 damage divided as you choose from any number of target heroes and/or allies.

name: Savage Fury
rules: Feral Hero Required; Ongoing: When you play a Feral ability, if you control a Form, your hero may deal 2 melee damage to target ally.
flavour: Never corner an animal unless you can kill it.

name: Seal of Betrayal
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing:When an ally is destroyed by combat damage dealt by your hero with a weapon, put that ally from its owner's graveyard into play under your control.; 2, Destroy Seal of Betrayal -> Gain control of target ally that your hero dealt combat damage to this turn.

name: Seal of Redemption
rules: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, put an ally card from your graveyard into hand.; 1, Destroy Seal of Redemption -> Put an ally card from your graveyard into hand.

name: Shadow and Flame
rules: Destruction Hero Required; Ongoing: 1, Destroy an ability you control -> Your hero deals 2 shadow or fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Diversity. - Harnessing Shadows by Lady Sevine

name: Shamanistic Dual Wield
rules: Enhancement Hero Required; Ongoing: You pay 1 less to strike with weapons.; Your hero has dual wield.
flavour: Sword, axe, and mace, heed my call!

name: Shield Slam
rules: Protection Hero Required; You may exhaust one of your Shields rather than pay Shield Slam's cost.; Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target hero or ally. If you targeted a hero, you may destroy an ability controlled by its controller.

name: Smash
rules: Destroy target equipment. If you do, your hero deals melee damage to its controller's hero equal to its cost.
flavour: The first rule of warfare? Remove the enemy's ability to make war. - Lionar, Unbound.

name: Snake Trap
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.); Put X Snake ally tokens with 1 Nature ATK / 1 health into play, where X is target opposing attacker's cost.

name: Spiritual Domination
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Put target ally card from an opponent's graveyard into play under your control.
flavour: Treachery is a virus infecting even the dead.

name: Stoneskin Totem
rules: Ongoing: Opposing allies have -1 ATK.; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)
flavour: Ever try to stab a rock? - Ixamos the Redeemed

name: Storm Shock
rules: Target Opponent chooses a hero or ally in his party, and your hero deals 4 nature damage to it.

name: Sudden Death
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Destroy target ally without damage.
flavour: Death comes quickly to the unprepared.

name: Survival Instincts
rules: Survival Hero Required; Ongoing: Prevent the first 4 damage that would be dealt to your hero each turn.
flavour: A hunter worth his weight in arrows knows to be prepared when the hunt turns on him. - Morn Walks-the-Path

name: Tainted Earth
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing: When an opponent completes a quest, your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero in his party.
flavour: The Druids of the Fang are an aberration. They seek to remake the land to mirror their own twisted dreams. - Warden Stormclaw

name: The Natural Order
rules: Destroy target ability or equipment.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Servants of the Betrayer (EA),Archive
flavour: It is nature's will to provide balance.

name: Titan's Grip
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Two-Handed dual wield.;(Your hero had dual wield. One or both of your weapons can be Two-Handed. You can have a Two-Handed weapon and an Off-Hand equipment.)
flavour: When the titans get a grip, they mean it.

name: Tomb of Ice
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing: At the end of each opponent's turn, destroy each ally in his party that neither attacked nor entered play this turn.
flavour: Keep moving or we'll freeze! - Morn Walks-the-Path

name: Totem of Decay
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, each opponent destroys an ability, ally, or equipment he controls.; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)
flavour: Life is attrition. - Ixamos the Corrupted

name: Totemic Recovery
rules: Put an Air, Earth, Fire, and Water Totem from your graveyard into play.
flavour: The elements will never abandon us. - Ixamos the Redeemed

name: Tranquility
rules: Your hero heals double X damage from each friendly hero and ally.
flavour: Stay close, my friends, and I will heal your wounds. - Mythen of the Wild

name: Unbalance
rules: Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies. If you have an equipment, each of them can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
flavour: No, really - don't get up. - Ressa Shadeshine

name: Unbridled Wrath
rules: Fury Hero Required; Ongoing: 1 -> Target weapon you control has +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: Metal is tempered by the heat of the earth and swung with the fire of the soul. - Codex of Defense

name: Water Shield
rules: Ongoing: Water Shield enters play with three mana counters.; When an opposing hero or ally deals damage to your hero, ready up to three of your resources and remove a mana counter. If none remain, destroy Water Shield.

name: Whirlwind
rules: Your hero deals melee damage to each opposing ally equal the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.
flavour: All men enter, no men leave.

name: Wrath of Turalyon
rules: Destroy all allies that attacked this turn.
flavour: Faith alone is not enough to stop the enemies of the Light. - Prince Arthas Menethil

name: Aesadonna Al'mere
rules: Stealth; When Aesadonna attacks, destroy target exhausted ally.
flavour: The deadliest assassins hide in plain sight.

name: Alchemist Norrin'thal
rules: 0 -> Norrin'thal becomes an Arcane ally this turn. Use only once per turn.; 0 -> Norrin'thal becomes a Fire ally this turn. Use only once per turn.
flavour: There is no magic I cannot master.

name: Anchorite Fareena
rules: Aldor Repuation; 0 -> Attach target attachment to Fareena. Use only once per turn.
flavour: Allow me to ease your burden.

name: Anchorite Karja
rules: Aldor Repuation; Ready allies in your party have +3 ATK / +3 health.
flavour: A single unprepared comrade can cost you your life.

name: Anchorite Onkoth
rules: Aldor Reputation; Inspire: Ability, Ally, Equipment, Hero, or Resource.
flavour: Valiance against the Legion is an obligation greater than the needs of any single draenei.

name: Angelista
rules: Stealth; At the end of your turn, you may put target equipment into its owner's hand.
flavour: Hi, I'm pretty sure you don't need that. Thanks.

name: Antikron the Unyielding
rules: Protector; Put 2 damage on your hero -> Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Antikron this combat. Use only if he's defending.

name: Apocanon
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ally cards in all zones are also Demon cards.

name: Arcanist Alathana
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Ability; When Alathana sabotages an ability, put a depletion counter on it. ; Abilities with depletion counters lose and can't have powers.

name: Arcanist Atikan
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Side Deck; When Atikan sabotages a side deck, cards in it can't leave that side deck this match.
flavour: That which was lost shall remain so.

name: Arcanist Dayvana
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Quest; When Dayvana sabotages a quest, you may complete it this turn.
flavour: Clearly, you are ill-suited to address the mental complexities of this issue. Clearly.

name: Arcanist Lyronia
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); When Lyronia enters play, look at the top card of target opponent's deck. You may put it on the bottom.
flavour: Victory is fleeting for you this day, cur.

name: Atani of the Watch
rules: Aldor Repuation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); If damage would be dealt to your hero, it's dealt to Atani instead.
flavour: Our duty requires resolve.

name: Barous the Storm Baron
rules: Nature allies in your party have [Exhaust] -> This ally deals nature damage equal to its ATK, divided as you choose, to any number of target allies.

name: Bearlady Brala
rules: When Brala enters play, make up a name.; At the start of your turn, put a unique Bear ally token with that name and 1 Melee ATK / 1 health into play.

name: Bogspike
rules: When Bogspike enter play, he may deal 1 melee damage to target ally.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: In Zangarmarsh, it's difficult to tell the spore bats from the trees.

name: Breen Toestubber
rules: Opposing allies have -1 ATK.
flavour: Turn back now. You are not welcome here.

name: Bulvai of the Watch
rules: Aldor Repuation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Protector; If damage would be dealt to your hero, it's dealt to Bulvai instead.
flavour: Our duty requires faith.

name: Cerrik Blooddawn
rules: Protector; When you play an ability, ready Cerrik.
flavour: A lost battle is nothing if you win the war.

name: Coilfang Myrmidon
rules: Traitor Hero Required; When Coilfang Myrmidon is destroyed, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's named Coildfang Myrmidon, draw it.
flavour: Ssslavesss, asssissst your massster!

name: David Smythe
rules: Protector; When David readies, you may remove an ally card in your graveyard form the game. If you do, destroy target equipment.
flavour: Tough times are ahead… for all of us.

name: Delrach the Vile
rules: When Delrach attacks, destroy any number of allies with an attachment.
flavour: I sense great power in you. I will enjoy taking it.

name: Domona the Ever-Watchful
rules: [Exhaust] -> Domona deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally.; When an opposing hero or ally attacks, ready Domona.

name: Dread Infernal
rules: When Dread Infernal enters or leaves play, he deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: When the smoke cleared, I wished it hadn't. - Warden Stormclaw

name: Exarch Orelis
rules: Aldor Reputation;Inspire: Ability, ally, equipment, hero, and resource
flavour: Your help is most welcome.

name: Falana of the Glen
rules: When Falana is destroyed, if an opponent has more resources than you, you may put Falana from the graveyard into her owner's resource row face down and exhausted.

name: Gobloz
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.); When an ally in your party is dealt damage, Gobloz may deal 1 fire damage to the source of that damage.
flavour: Fine, fine! Don't say I never did anything for you!

name: Gok Stormhammer
rules: Long-Range; When Gok enters play, he deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.

name: Highlord Bolvar Fordragon
rules: Opposing allies must attack if able and can attack only Bolvar if able. ; Opposing cards and effects must target Bolvar if able
flavour: Today, we celebrate this glorious victory!

name: Horace Shadowfall
rules: Opposing heroes and allies can attack only Demons in your party if able.
flavour: My friends are interested in making your acquaintance.

name: Hulok Trailblazer
rules: When you place a quest, Hulok deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: The path is clear. Follow my marks, and you'll be fine.

name: Icemistress Gal'ha
rules: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one for each [Frost] ally in your party.
flavour: De chill of death is in da air.

name: Inventor Dorbin Callus
rules: Elusive; [Exhaust] -> Target player draws four cards.
flavour: A world-famous engineer, he is perhaps best known as the inventor of the miraculous MUL-T Passkey.

name: Jae'va the Relentless
rules: Protector; Exhaust a hero or ally in your party -> Ready Jae'va. Use only once per turn.
flavour: This battle has just begun.

name: Jessup Smythe
rules: When Jessup readies, you may remove an ally card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, destroy target ally.
flavour: The deaths of our comrades will be avenged soon enough.

name: Jezbella of Karabor
rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.); Exhaust an ally in your party -> Jezbella has +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: Here and now we make our stand against the Burning Legion.

name: Justicar Brace
rules: Brace can protect heroes and allies with damage.
flavour: I took a vow to defend the weak, and I mean to keep it.

name: King Khan
rules: When King Khan enters combat, he deals 2 nature damage to each opposing ally.
flavour: He's an expert in gorilla warfare.

name: Kronore
rules: [Exhaust] -> Ready all allies in your party.
flavour: The people shall be heard.

name: Lady Katrana Prestor
rules: Traitor Hero Required; 15 -> Remove all of your cards in all zones from the game and start an Onyxia Raid.
flavour: This world has enough heroes.

name: Lady Vashj
rules: Traitor Hero Required; At the end of each turn, roll a die. Put that many Naga ally tokens with 1 Melee ATK / 1 health into play.
flavour: Victory to Lord Illidan!

name: Leoroxx
rules: When Leoroxx attacks, destroy all opposing allies.

name: Lifemistress Tanagra
rules: Nature allies in your party have +1 ATK for each other Nature ally in your party.
flavour: My fury is a terrible sight to behold!

name: Lilith Smythe
rules: When Lillith readies, you may remove an ally card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, destroy target ability.
flavour: An unwilling sacrifice will serve my purposes as well as any other.

name: Llyras Keeneye
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.); Llyras has +1 ATK/ +1 health for each ally in your party with cost 3 or more.

name: Lunen the Moon Baron
rules: Elusive; Arcane allies in your party have [Exhaust] -> Draw a card.

name: Magistrix Dianas
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); When Dianas enters play, look at the top card of your deck. Either draw it or put it on the bottom. If you draw it, put Dianas from play into her owner's hand.

name: Magistrix Larynna
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Graveyard; When Larynna sabotages a graveyard, she deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally for each card in it.
flavour: The tactical advantage here is too high to pass up.

name: Marksman Eowan
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Long-Range; When an opposing ally is dealt non-ranged damage, Eowan deals 1 Ranged damage to it.

name: Marksman Glous
rules: Aldor Reputation;Inspire: Quest; When a quest is inspired this way, you pay 1 less to complete it this turn.
flavour: To do what needs to be done, you have to know where to do it.

name: Matalo Trailfinder
rules: Matalo has +1 ATK while attacking for each quest you have.
flavour: Stay hidden. I'll pick up the trail.

name: Millhouse Manastorm
rules: Millhouse enters play with three monologue counters and can't attack while he has any.;1, Say Lowly? Nobody refers to the mighty Millhouse Manastorm as lowly! -> Remove a monologue counter.;2, Say Ice, Ice, Baby! -> Remove a monologue counter.;3, Say I'm gonna light you up, sweet cheeks! > Remove a monologue counter.;Use each of these powers only once per game.

name: Miner Steelwhiskers
rules: Elusive; [Exhaust] -> Put the top two cards of your deck into your graveyard.
flavour: Let's see what you're up to, eh?

name: Mojo Doctor Zin'tar
rules: When Zin'tar attacks, he heals 1 damage from target hero or ally in your party and deals 1 nature damage to target opposing hero or ally.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Servants of the Betrayer (EA)

name: Myriam Starcaller
rules: Untargetable; [Exhaust] -> Myriam deals 5 arcane damage to target hero.
flavour: The moon is full tonight. This does not bode well for you.

name: Narthadus
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.); At the end of your turn, you may destroy target ability.

name: Niyore of the Watch
rules: Aldor Repuation; If damage would be dealt to your hero, it's dealt to Niyore instead. ; When Niyore is dealt damage, he deals 2 melee damage to its source.
flavour: Our duty requires sacrifice.

name: Orderkeeper Calister
rules: Protector; Opponents pay 2 more to play equipment.
flavour: Chaos must be fought, no matter the cost.

name: Orderkeeper Henley
rules: Opponents pay 2 more to play abilities.
flavour: Don't waste your breath.

name: Orderkeeper Vesra
rules: Opponents pay 2 more to play allies.

name: Pathaleon the Calculator
rules: Traitor Hero Required; 2, Remove Pathaleon from the game -> Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck, then draw that many cards. You can use this power if Pathaleon is in your hand or party.
flavour: Time to supplement my workforce.

name: Prince Kael'thas Sunstrider
rules: Traitor Hero Required; At the end of your turn, gain control of all ready opposing resources. (Move them to your resource row.)
flavour: Welcome… to the future. A pity you are too late to stop it. No one can stop me now! Selama ashal'amore!

name: Quigley Slipshade
rules: 1 -> Quigley is Elusive this turn.; 1 -> Quigley is Untargetable this turn.

name: Rames the Purifier
rules: At the end of your turn, you may destroy an ability attached to a hero or ally in your party.
flavour: The wicked do not deserve the power they wield.

name: Ras'fari Bloodfrenzy
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.); When Ras'fari attacks for the first time each turn, ready him if he has damage.
flavour: It hurts me, mon. But it'll hurt choo more.

name: Razak Ironsides
rules: When an opposing her or ally readies, Razal deals 4 ranged damage to it.
flavour: Come on, you apes. You want to live forever?

name: Retainer Athan
rules: Scryer ReputationWhen Athan is destroyed, target player discards his hand, then draws that many cards.

name: Retainer Cara
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Sabotage: Equipment (This ally can attack opposing equipment.); When Cara sabotages an equipment, gain control of it.
flavour: That's a fine blade. It will serve me well.

name: Retainer Eteron
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Hand; When Eteron sabotages an opponent's hand, look at it and choose up to two cards. That opponent puts those cards in his resource row face down and exhausted.
flavour: The Scryers have eyes and ears in all parts of Outlands.

name: Retainer Ryn
rules: Scryer Reputation; Sabotage: Player; When Ryn sabotages a player, that player chooses an ability, ally, equipment, or resource he controls and puts it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Retainer Zian
rules: Scryer Reputation; Stealth; Zian has -1 ATK / -1 health for each Protector in play.

name: Roena Trailmaker
rules: Protector; Roena has +1 health for each quest you have.
flavour: It will take me a day, perhaps two, to clear the road ahead.

name: Rogg Dreadnock
rules: When your hero defends, Rogg deals 2 ranged damage to target attacker.
flavour: They will charge, and when they do, we'll be ready for them.

name: Roke the Ice Baron
rules: Elusive; Frost allies in your party have [Exhaust] -> Target ally can't attack this turn.
flavour: Battle has left his heart as cold as his art.

name: Rysa the Earthcaller
rules: Protector; At the start of your turn, put a Totem card from your graveyard into hand.
flavour: There is much that can be recovered from this shattered land.

name: Sampron the Banisher
rules: [Exhaust] -> Remove target opposing ally from the game.; When Sampron leaves play, the owner of each card removed this way puts that card into play.
flavour: Mysterious disappearances? I wouldn't know anything about that.

name: Saurfang the Younger
rules: Protector; When Saurfang enters combat with an ally with damage, destroy it and ready Saurfang.
flavour: Like father, like son.

name: Scholar Krosiss
rules: Krosiss has +2 ATK/ +2 Health while you have seven or more cards in hand.
flavour: In death, I have plenty of time to study my ancient tomes.

name: Sek Grimlash
rules: 2, Destroy another ally in your party [Exhaust] Put a Demon ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.

name: Shadow Silhouettes
rules: At the end of your turn, remove 6 damage from your hero and put 1 damage on Shadow Silhouettes for each damage removed this way.
flavour: I don't worry about pain. I have something else for that. - Omedus the Punisher

name: Sha'kar
rules: If your hero has dealt fire, frost, or nature damage this turn, Sha'kar has Ferocity. (He can attack immediately.)
flavour: You go first, mon. I be right behin' joo.

name: Skymistress Taranna
rules: When another Arcane ally enters your party, draw a card.

name: Spymaster Thalodien
rules: Scryer Reputation, Sabotage: Deck; When Thalodien sabotages a deck, reveal cards from the top until you reveal a non-quest card. Remove that card from the game and put the rest on the bottom. You may play that card without paying its play cost this turn.
flavour: My tactics are not subtle, but they work.

name: Stella Forgebane
rules: At the end of your turn, you may destroy target exhausted equipment.

name: Sunseeker Astromage
rules: Traitor Hero Required; When another ally named Sunseeker Astromage in your party is destroyed, draw a card.
flavour: For Kael'thas!

name: Tarn Darkwalker
rules: Demons have Ferocity. (They can attack immediately.)
flavour: Send the fiends in first, before they can turn on you.

name: Tatulla the Reclaimer
rules: When Tatulla enters play, target player destroys an ability or equipment he controls.
flavour: All things created must return back to the earth.

name: Ulrac Bloodshadow
rules: Ferocity. When Ulrac attacks, put a Demon ally card from your graveyard into hand.
flavour: Mortals die, but demons are forever!

name: Vexmaster Nar'jo
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.); Nar'jo has +2 ATK while attacking a ready ally.
flavour: Stand still, mon. It be over soon.

name: Vindicator Agran
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Protector;Inspire: Protector (You may ready one of your protectors during each other player's ready step.)
flavour: There will never again come a time when the Aldor cannot protect Shattrath from her enemies.

name: Vindicator Ostakron
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Protector; Inspire: Armor (You may ready one of your armor during each other player's ready step.)

name: Warlord Kalithresh
rules: Traitor Hero Required; At the end of your turn, put a Naga Distiller ally token with 0 Mele ATK / 1 health into play.; At the start of your turn, destroy a Naga Distiller in your party.; If you do, Kalithresh has +5 ATK this turn.

name: X-51 Nether-Rocket
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target Horde ally in your party has Ferocity this turn. At end of turn, destroy it.; 1, [Exhaust] -> Target Alliance ally in your party can use [Activated] powers this turn. At end of turn, destroy it.
flavour: My advice? Hold on and don't let go. - Landro Longshot

name: Xanata the Lightsworn
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Protector; If Xanata would be dealt combat damage while defending, prevent 2 of it.

name: Arcanium Signet Bands
rules: [Exhaust] -> If target ally would be dealt damage this turn, it's dealt double that much instead.

name: Armwraps of Disdain
rules: Destroy an ability you control -> your hero has +1 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Azure-Shield of Coldarra
rules: If your hero would be dealt damage, prevent all but 3 of it.
flavour: Long guarded by the blue dragonflight, this relic was passed on to the naaru and then to those who would defend the Light.

name: Barbaric Legstraps
rules: [Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally. Use only if an opposing ally was destroyed this turn.
flavour: These leggings were once among the trove of the Black Stalker, a menace to Sporeggar and all of Zangarmarsh.

name: Blade of Wizardry
rules: 1, [Exhaust], Discard an ability card -> Destroy target ally.
flavour: Give yourself to the flame of this blade, and your enemies will be consumed by its power. - Vor'na the Disciplined

name: Bloodskull Destroyer
rules: 1, Destroy Bloodskull Destroyer -> Destroy target ally with Protector.
flavour: Only a tool would willingly stand in its path.

name: Choker of Vile Intent
rules: At the start of your turn, you may destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control. If you do, each opponent destroys a card of that kind he controls.
flavour: It has the desperate fell of a hand around your neck.

name: Doomplate Warhelm
rules: Each of your armor has +3 DEF while you have five or more equipment.
flavour: It defies the very doom from wich it was named

name: Essence Gatherer
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, you may pay 1. If you do, draw a card.

name: Fanblade Pauldrons
rules: Exhaust your hero -> Fanblade Pauldrons has +4 DEF this turn.
flavour: Let them charge! My shoulders will greet them! - Lionar, Unbound

name: Helm of Desolation
rules: When you strike with a weapon, target ally in your party has +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: This helm is one of many powerful treasures that can only be retrieved by traveling into the past.

name: Hourglass of the Unraveller
rules: You pay 1 less to play equipment, to a minimum of 1.

name: Legguards of the Shattered Hand
rules: [Exhaust] -> Destroy target ally with damage on it.

name: Mana-Etched Crown
rules: [Exhaust] -> Put target ability card from your graveyard into your resource row face down and exhausted. Use only if you have seven or more cards in hand.
flavour: Past accomplishments can have present implications.

name: Mana-Sphere Shoulderguards
rules: When an opponent discards a card, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in that opponent's party.
flavour: The energy within attracted the ravenous hunger of Zereketh the Unbound.

name: Plasma Rat's Hyper-Scythe
rules: Exhaust one of your armor or weapons -> Ready one of your resources.
flavour: The second of Plasma Rat's infamous creations. His first, the Turbogyro Mouse Delouser, is not as widely known.

name: Quagmirran's Eye
rules: You pay 1 less to play abilities, to a minimum of 1.
flavour: Hidden within the eye lies the very secret of magic.

name: Quantum Blade
rules: Remove the top ten cards of your deck from the game -> You pay 5 less the next time you strike with Quantum Blade this turn.
flavour: I'm uncertain of the theoretical consequences of using this sword! - Bildros Nullvoid

name: Reflex Blades
rules: When you play an armor or weapon, ready Reflex Blades and your hero.
flavour: For every action, these blades provide an equal and deadly reaction.

name: Ring of the Shadow Deeps
rules: [Exhaust], Destroy an ally in your party -> Your hero has +2 ATK while attacking this turn.
flavour: Long forgotten on the bottom of Ghaz'an's water tank, the ring waited patiently.

name: Ring of the Silver Hand
rules: [Exhaust] -> Prevent all combat damage that target attacking ally would deal to your hero this combat.
flavour: The order was shattered when Lordaeron fell to the Scourge, but the relics of the Silver Hand persevere.

name: Terokk's Shadowstaff
rules: 2, Destroy Terokk's Shadowstaff -> Target opponent chooses an ally in his party, and you gain control of it.
flavour: Clutching this staff and gripped by madness, Talon King Ikiss proclaimed himself Terokk reborn.

name: Vileblade of the Betrayer
rules: You may remove a Poison card in hand from the game rather than pay Vileblade of the Betrayer's cost.
flavour: The sinister blade has outlived every assassin to wield it.

name: Voidfire Wand
rules: When combat damage is dealt with Voidfire Wand to a hero, the next time that hero's controller would draw a card, he skips drawing it instead.

name: Wand of the Seer
rules: When your hero deals damage with an ability to a hero, it also deals that much nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target allies.
flavour: It bestows both power and foresight.

name: Wastewalker Helm
rules: When your hero deals damage to an exhausted ally, destroy it.

name: Wastewalker Leggings
rules: When an opposing hero or ally becomes exhausted, your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.
flavour: True to his word, Nexus-Prince Shaffar could show you things you coudn't imagine.

name: Wrathtide Longbow
rules: When you strike with Wrathtide Longbow, your hero has Long-Range this combat.; When an opposing ally enters play, your hero deals 1 ranged damage to it.

name: Bloodtusk
rules: 5, Flip Bloodtusk -> Discard your hand. Each opponent discards a card for each card you discarded this way. Use only on your turn.; Hakkari

name: Commander Michael Goodchilde
rules: 2, Flip Michael -> If a friendly ally would deal combat damage while defending this turn, it deals that much +2 instead.
flavour: You stand in judgment before the Light!

name: Crusader Michael Goodchilde
rules: 2, Flip Michael -> If an opposing ally would be dealt combat damage while defending this turn, it's dealt that much +2 instead.; Scarlet Crusade
flavour: The Light will unite the righteous to strike down the wicked. - Commander Goodchilde

name: Desecrator Stormclaw
rules: 2, Flip Stormclaw, destroy a friendly ally -> Put target Form card from your graveyard into hand.; Druids of the Fang

name: Fallenstar
rules: 2, Flip Fallenstar -> Fallenstar deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally without damage.; Use only on your turn.; Tortured Spirit

name: Fallingstar
rules: 1, Flip Fallingstar -> Allies in your party with damage have +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: Bandu thoribas!

name: Ixamos the Corrupted
rules: 2, Flip Ixamos, destroy a friendly Totem -> Ready Ixamos and all of your weapons.; Auchenai

name: Ixamos the Redeemed
rules: 3, Flip Ixamos, exhaust one of your Totems -> Ready target ally.
flavour: I have seen the error of my ways. I will give my life to destroy the Legion!

name: Jonas the Red
rules: 2, Flip Jonas -> When target friendly ally deals combat damage to an ally this turn, destroy both.; Burning Blade

name: Jonas White
rules: 3, Flip Jonas, exhaust an ally in your party -> That ally deals melee damage equal to its ATK to target ally.
flavour: Let me show you how it's done…

name: Kil'zin of the Bloodscalp
rules: 1, Flip Kil'zin Kil'zin deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally in an opponent's party. When damage is dealt this way, that opponent's hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally of his choice.; Bloodscalp

name: Kil'zin of the Darkspear
rules: 2, Flip Kil'zin -> Target opponent chooses an ally in his party, and Kil'zin deals 3 nature damage to it. Use only on your turn.
flavour: It's not me, it's the spirits, mon. Dey be angry wit choo.

name: Lelora Sunlancer
rules: 3, Flip Lelora -> Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target friendly ally this turn.
flavour: Do you seek to test my mastery of the Light?

name: Lelora the Dawnslayer
rules: 1, Flip Lelora -> If combat damage would be dealt to or dealt by target opposing ally this turn, double it instead.; Crimson Hand

name: Lionar the Blood Cursed
rules: 2, Flip Lionar -> Destroy target ally with Protector. Use only on your turn.; Shattered Hand

name: Lionar, Unbound
rules: 3, Flip Lionar -> Protectors in your party have +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: WE ARE HORDE!

name: Marlowe Christophers
rules: 6, Flip Marlowe -> Target hero or ally has -5 health this turn. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The curse's effect is only temporary. Your death will not be.

name: Marlowe the Felsworn
rules: 2, Flip Marlow, destroy a friendly ally -> Target hero or ally has -X health this turn, where X is that friendly ally's health. Use only on your turn.; Cult of the Dark Strand

name: Morn Salts-the-Land
rules: 3, Flip Morn -> You can play target ability card from an opponent's graveyard this turn.; Grimtotem

name: Morn Walks-the-Path
rules: 3, Flip Morn -> You can play target ability card from your graveyard this turn.
flavour: I never let anything go to waste.

name: Mythen of the Fang
rules: 2, Flip Mythen -> Mythen deals 1 nature damage to target hero for each quest its controller has.; Druids of the Fang

name: Mythen of the Wild
rules: 2, Flip Mythen -> Mythen heals 2 damage from target hero or ally for each quest you have.
flavour: Naralex hoped to revitalize the Barrens. If only he hadn't become trapped in a nightmare!

name: Obora the Mad
rules: 2, Flip Obora -> When an opponent draws a card this turn, Obora deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally in that opponent's party.; Auchenai

name: Obora the Wise
rules: 4, Flip Obora -> When you play an ability this turn, draw a card.
flavour: This is Draenor, our home. We must reclaim it from those who would corrupt it.

name: Plague Demonsoul
rules: 2, Flip Plague -> If a Demon in your party would be dealt damage this turn, it's dealt to Plague instead.; Shadowsworn

name: Plague Fleshbane
rules: 2, Flip Plague -> If Plague would be dealt damage this turn, you may choose a Demon in your party. If you do, that damage is dealt to that Demon instead.
flavour: The Legion are mere pawns in the greater game.

name: Remba, Abbess of Ash
rules: 4, Flip Remba -> Gain control of target ally with an attachment. Use only on your turn.; Shadowforge

name: Ressa Shadeshine
rules: 2, Flip Ressa -> Ressa deals melee damage to target ally equal to the ATK of one of your weapons.
flavour: Well, fancy stunning into you here, of all places.

name: Ressa the Leper Queen
rules: 3, Flip Ressa -> Target player destroys one of his equipment.; Leper Gnome

name: Runetusk
rules: 2, Flip Runetusk -> Target opponent discards a card. Use only on your turn.
flavour: Don't go too far into da shadow, mon, or joo won't make it out.

name: Seadog Nally
rules: 2, Flip Nally, destroy a friendly ally Nally deals ranged damage to target ally equal to that friendly ally's ATK.; Southsea Freebooters

name: Sharpshooter Nally
rules: 3, Flip Nally -> Target hero or ally has Long-Range this turn.
flavour: Aye, soon your shots will be as good as mine.

name: Sister Remba
rules: 1, Flip Remba -> Target ally in your party with an attachment is Elusive and Untargetable this turn.
flavour: We must remember the debts we owe to those who came before us, and spread their knowledge to all who will listen.

name: Vor'na the Disciplined
rules: 3, Flip Vor'na -> Allies can't attack this turn.
flavour: Our thirst for magic is ambition, not addiction.

name: Vor'na the Wretched
rules: 3, Flip Vor'na -> At the end of this turn, the player whose turn it is destroys each ally in his party that neither attacked nor entered play this turn.; Wretched

name: Warden Stormclaw
rules: 2, Flip Stormclaw, destroy a Form you control -> Destroy target ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The Earth Mother provides all we need.

name: A Warm Welcome
rules: If your hero has dealt 5 or more damage this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: I want you to go to the various naga strongholds in Zangarmarsh and show them that we're not to be crossed. - Warden Hamoot

name: An Improper Burial
rules: Remove any number of ally cards in your graveyard from the game and pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each three ally cards removed this way.
flavour: Take this torch and travel to the field of battle, directly east of here. Burn every corpse you see! - Commander Ra'vaj

name: Deep Sea Salvage
rules: During your turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a card from your graveyard on top of your deck.
flavour: If the information from those sources were to fall into enemy hands, Fleet Master Seahorn would force us down the plank. - First Mate Nilzlix

name: Dr. Boom!
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck, put damage on your hero equal to its cost, then put it into hand.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2010,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: My former protege, Sparky Uberthruster, wouldn't wear his helmet while down here and one day transformed into the infamous Dr. Boom! - Lead Sapper Blastfizzle

name: Firewing Signets
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); If an ally with sabotage is in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The only way to prove you're with us is to do your share of fighting. - Magistrix Fyalenn

name: Information Gathering
rules: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into hand, one on top of your deck, and the other on the bottom.
flavour: I've prepared a uniform with the pieces you obtained. - Caledis Brightdawn

name: Kim'jael Indeed!
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with the same name as a card in play you control intro your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: They hired me to help them scout the area looking for some sort of lost treasures. - Kim'jael

name: Leader of the Darkcrest
rules: If an ally with cost 5 or more is in your party, pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.
flavour: The Darkcrest have been linked to numerous attacks against the Cenarion Expedition, and their leader is considered extemely dangerous. - Wanted Poster

name: Manaforge B'naar
rules: Scryer Reputation (Can't put Aldor cards in your deck.); Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Exhaust target ally.
flavour: You can help our information gathering efforts by obtaining a personnel roster. - Spymaster Thalodien

name: Marks of Kil'jaeden
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); If an ally with inspire is in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: If you wish to prove yourself to the Aldor, bring me the insignias of low-ranking Legion and their Shadow Council followers. - Adyen the Lightwarden

name: Meeting with the Master
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each five resources you have.
flavour: I can only take enjoyment in making fun of the ridiculous clothes you wear or the pathetic look on your face. - Sanath Lim-yo

name: Needs More Cowbell
rules: During your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a unique Ghost Cow ally token named Bessy into play with 1 Melee ATK / 1 health and At the start of your turn, remove this ally from the game. If you do, you may remove this ally from the game.

name: Orders From Lady Vashj
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you have no cards in hand, draw two cards.
flavour: This letter contains detailed orders to the Coilfang naga operating the steam vaults... The orders bear the seal of the infamous Lady Vashj. - Ysiel Windsinger

name: Potential Energy Source
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: You pay 4 less to complete your next quest this turn.
flavour: We'll have to be careful with it, but I think we can find a way to adapt this to help ward off the mana creatures. - Lieutenant-Sorcerer Morran

name: Preparing for War
rules: Pay X to complete this quest.;Reward: Shuffle X target cards from any number of graveyards into their owners' decks.
flavour: We have many among us who are willing to fight but are ill equiped. Bring me the naga's own weapons so that we may reforge them into glaives and arrowheads. - Ysiel Windsinger

name: Shutting Down Manaforge Ara
rules: If an equipment was destroyed this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: One manaforge is all that keeps Tempest Keep functional. - Anchorite Karja

name: Sunfury Briefings
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Ready an ally in your party.
flavour: We've been informed Manaforge Duro is under attack by mana creatures. It is possible that those defending it have not yet destroyed their briefings. Obtain them and bring them to me. - Exarch Orelis

name: The Sigil of Krasus
rules: If an opponent played an ally this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: It was a great boon to us in our battle against the orcs and it could play a key role in helping me break the enchantment that imprisons me. - Archmage Vargoth

name: The Unending Invasion
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, then draw another one for each 10 damage on your hero.
flavour: Beings of pure mana began streaming into the village from all over the area. For now, we're containing them as we can... - Lieutenant-Sorcerer Morran

name: You, Robot
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Equipment cards in your hand are instant this turn.
flavour: Here, take this controller. I want you to activate it and give my newly-invented Scrap Reaver X6000 a spin. - Doctor Vomisa, Ph.T.

name: Smash
rules: Destroy target equipment. If you do, your hero deals melee damage to its controller's hero equal to its cost.
flavour: The first rule of warfare? Remove the enemy's ability to make war. - Lionar, Unbound.

name: Ras'fari Bloodfrenzy
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.); When Ras'fari attacks for the first time each turn, ready him if he has damage.
flavour: It hurts me, mon. But it'll hurt choo more.

name: Prince Kael'thas Sunstrider
rules: Traitor Hero Required; At the end of your turn, gain control of all ready opposing resources. (Move them to your resource row.)
flavour: Welcome… to the future. A pity you are too late to stop it. No one can stop me now! Selama ashal'amore!

name: Personal Weather Maker
rules: Ongoing: Play with the top card of your deck revealed.; Opponents can't target cards in play you control that share a type with the top card of your deck.
flavour: Today's forcast calls for…

name: Meeting with the Master
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each five resources you have.
flavour: I can only take enjoyment in making fun of the ridiculous clothes you wear or the pathetic look on your face. - Sanath Lim-yo

name: Marksman Glous
rules: Aldor Reputation;Inspire: Quest; When a quest is inspired this way, you pay 1 less to complete it this turn.
flavour: To do what needs to be done, you have to know where to do it.

name: Lady Katrana Prestor
rules: Traitor Hero Required; 15 -> Remove all of your cards in all zones from the game and start an Onyxia Raid.
flavour: This world has enough heroes.

name: Earth Mother's Blessing
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally had +3 ATK / +3 health.; When attached ally is destroyed, draw a card.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: From nature comes everything. Those who appreciate that may partake of its bounty. - Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem

name: Dr. Boom!
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck, put damage on your hero equal to its cost, then put it into hand.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: My former protege, Sparky Uberthruster, wouldn't wear his helmet while down here and one day transformed into the infamous Dr. Boom! - Lead Sapper Blastfizzle

name: Bearlady Brala
rules: When Brala enters play, make up a name.; At the start of your turn, put a unique Bear ally token with that name and 1 Melee ATK / 1 health into play.

name: Apocanon
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Ally cards in all zones are also Demon cards.

name: A Warm Welcome
rules: If your hero has dealt 5 or more damage this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: I want you to go to the various naga strongholds in Zangarmarsh and show them that we're not to be crossed. - Warden Hamoot

name: Spymaster Thalodien
rules: Scryer Reputation, Sabotage: Deck; When Thalodien sabotages a deck, reveal cards from the top until you reveal a non-quest card. Remove that card from the game and put the rest on the bottom. You may play that card without paying its play cost this turn.
flavour: My tactics are not subtle, but they work.

name: The Natural Order
rules: Destroy target ability or equipment.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive
flavour: It is nature's will to provide balance.

name: The Sigil of Krasus
rules: If an opponent played an ally this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: It was a great boon to us in our battle against the orcs and it could play a key role in helping me break the enchantment that imprisons me. - Archmage Vargoth

name: Warlord Kalithresh
rules: Traitor Hero Required; At the end of your turn, put a Naga Distiller ally token with 0 Mele ATK / 1 health into play.; At the start of your turn, destroy a Naga Distiller in your party.; If you do, Kalithresh has +5 ATK this turn.

name: X-51 Nether-Rocket
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target Horde ally in your party has Ferocity this turn. At end of turn, destroy it.; 1, [Exhaust] -> Target Alliance ally in your party can use [Activated] powers this turn. At end of turn, destroy it.
flavour: My advice? Hold on and don't let go. - Landro Longshot

name: Death Shock
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target ally for each damage on your hero.
flavour: Feel my pain. - Ixamos the Corrupted

name: Chew Toy
rules: If you control a Form, destroy target ally.
flavour: Ever notice how totems look like scratching posts? - Warden Stormclaw

name: Bogspike
rules: When Bogspike enter play, he may deal 1 melee damage to target ally.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Banish to the Nether
rules: Remove target ability, ally, or equipment from game.; Ongoing: When Banish to the Nether leaves play, the owner of that removed card puts that card into play.

name: Antikron the Unyielding
rules: Protector; Put 2 damage on your hero -> Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Antikron this combat. Use only if he's defending.

name: Angelista
rules: Stealth; At the end of your turn, you may put target equipment into its owner's hand.
flavour: Hi, I'm pretty sure you don't need that. Thanks.

name: Invocation
rules: Ongoing: 2, Destory Invocation -> This turn, your resources have [Exhaust] -> Draw a card.
flavour: Allow me a moment to catch my breath - Obora the Wise

name: Melt Face
rules: Target player destroys an ally in his party.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive
flavour: Some priests heal; others enhance. I, however, melt faces! - Omedus the Punisher

name: Miner Steelwhiskers
rules: Elusive; [Exhaust] -> Put the top two cards of your deck into your graveyard.
flavour: Let's see what you're up to, eh?

name: Mojo Doctor Zin'tar
rules: When Zin'tar attacks, he heals 1 damage from target hero or ally in your party and deals 1 nature damage to target opposing hero or ally.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Plasma Rat's Hyper-Scythe
rules: Exhaust one of your armor or weapons -> Ready one of your resources.
flavour: The second of Plasma Rat's infamous creations. His first, the Turbogyro Mouse Delouser, is not as widely known.

name: Quigley Slipshade
rules: 1 -> Quigley is Elusive this turn.; 1 -> Quigley is Untargetable this turn.

name: Spiritual Domination
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Put target ally card from an opponent's graveyard into play under your control.
flavour: Treachery is a virus infecting even the dead.

name: Sudden Death
rules: Traitor Hero Required; Destroy target ally without damage.
flavour: Death comes quickly to the unprepared.

name: Vexmaster Nar'jo
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.); Nar'jo has +2 ATK while attacking a ready ally.
flavour: Stand still, mon. It be over soon.

name: Voidfire Wand
rules: When combat damage is dealt with Voidfire Wand to a hero, the next time that hero's controller would draw a card, he skips drawing it instead.

name: Xanata the Lightsworn
rules: Aldor Reputation (Can't put Scryer cards in your deck.); Protector; If Xanata would be dealt combat damage while defending, prevent 2 of it.

name: Gut Shot
rules: Traitor Hero Required; As an additional cost to play, remove up to five ally cards in your graveyard from the game.; Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to 2 plus the number of cards removed this way.

name: Papa Hummel's Old-Fashioned Pet Biscuit
rules: Attach to target Pet ally in your party and put X growth counters on Papa Hummel's Old-Fashioned Pet Biscuit.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 ATK/+1 health for each growth counter.
